Room.Name: Assassin's Guild
Room.ShortDescription: You've walked into a darkly lit room with a few torches lit along the walls.
Room.LongDescription: Its a strange feeling, since the room appears to be empty, but you feel as if there are eyes watching you from every corner of this dark, little room. A small note lies on the floor. It reads, "Assassins for hire. Enquire within." If anyone were here, you probably could ask where experienced assassins train for a higher level.
